name: Is your refrigerator running?
description:
Had an upload issue with the game jam :(

A stealth game without stealthy movement.

The goal is to sneak from the back room to your place in the showroom without being noticed.

Player controls: 

   WS controls the left side of the fridge

   Up and down arrows control the right side of the fridge

Camera controls:

   Right click to rotate camera

   Scroll to zoom
